If I had to pick whether to Play Portal or Portal 2, I would choose this one.  Because of how unlike the first Portal, the second installment also has platforming sections and puzzles that aren't as difficult as the first game.  Making this version of Portal the better of the two.
I need a part more than 2 less than 4 pls
juegaso se lo recomiendo a todo el mundo
just buy it if you have a friend. it's a must buy

AMAZING game, the scenery is really something to behold, especially for 2011, and an outstanding soundtrack with unique tracks such as Forwarding the Cause of Science really gives it a boost. The Perpetual Testing Initiative, (PeTI) basically a puzzle maker, makes this the definitive experience compared to the console releases.  Overall, I would give this game a Burning House of Life's Manager/10.
Fun, a classic puzzle game for co-op or single player, although I am yet to play single player this game is spoken very highly of so I imagine that the solo experience is epic too.
it's THE puzzle game of puzzle games.
nothing else to say than: fucking incredible
this game taught me to hate lemons.
10 раздавленных и сожженных лазером друзей из 10

Honestly, even though it's now an old game everything about it- the graphics, the story, the characters- Every time you play it it feels brand new. I love this game, and if you are considering picking it up, i really do recommend it.

Это идеальный пример игры-головоломки. Она обеспечивает несколько часов увлекательного прохождение не простых,  но и не сверхсложных уровней на пространственное мышление. Игра не обделена хорошим сюжетом, что вместе с приятной русской озвучкой придаёт игре атмосферности. Отдельного восхищения заслуживает шикарнейший кооперативный режим, уровни которого отличаются от уровней одиночного режима. 

Вообщем, это очень продуманная игра. Разработчики большие молодцы! 10 из 10
Побольше бы таких игр...
Do I have to say anything? Best game of the decade. Period
muy buen juego, te hace pensar y es atrapante
this game is practically mandatory for everyones steam library
Great gameplay, hilarious comments. Absolutely recommend the game! Co-op mode is fun too!

its a great game and a perfect sequel to the original.  the graphics are fantastic and set the mood for your journey through the abandoned and slowly eroding testing facility.
Valve can never release another game as far as I am concerned; Portal 2 is simply PERFECT.

Oynayın da biraz zekanız gelişsin. Şaka bir yana efsane oyun zaten bir şey demeye gerek yok. Devamı getirilebilir bir şekilde bitti gelsin bence Portal 3. Hikayesi ilk oyundan daha güzeldi. Eksik yanı yok arkadaşlar 10/10

british robots and broken mountable gmod content
























































































































9/10

Valve jak Valve znowu odwaliło wspaniałą robotę kontynuując każdemu znany fandom Portala.

Gra nie gorsza niż jedynka, jest zrobiona bardzo dobrze i wręcz mega przyjemnie się w nią gra i teleportuje wszystkimi portalami. Niektóre łamigłówki są dość trudne, ale wszystkie do zrobienia w dość krótkim czasie :)

Polecam serdecznie tą odsłonę.
Ocena: 9/10
